field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where year(ngay_ks) >= @year)⩓not exists(select 1 from cdnvbh b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.tk = b.tk and @@table.ma_nvbh = b.ma_nvbh and b.nam = @year) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)⩓exists(select 1 from cdnvbh b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.tk = b.tk and @@table.ma_nvbh = b.ma_nvbh and b.nam = @year) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_edit = 1)

field.name: tk
field.check: tk not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: ma_nvbh
field.check: ma_nvbh not in (select ma_nvbh from dmnvbh)

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: ma_kh <> '' and ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from dmkh)⩓ma_kh <> '' and tk in (select tk from dmtk where tk_cn = 0)⩓ma_kh = '' and tk in (select tk from dmtk where tk_cn = 1)

declare @message nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @r int, @user int, @admin bit, @unit varchar(32), @year int select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @unit = @@unit, @year = nam_bd from dmstt if @admin <> 1 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'SalesEmployeesOpeningBalance', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = 0 end end &Checking; &EndErrorMode; update @@table set du_co_nt00 = 0 where du_no_nt00 <> 0 update @@table set du_co00 = 0 where du_no00 <> 0 if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from cdnvbh b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_nvbh = b.ma_nvbh and b.nam = @year and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh) select a.* into #k from @@table a join cdnvbh b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_nvbh = b.ma_nvbh and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where b.nam = @year delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_nvbh = b.ma_nvbh and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh)
&Inserting; if @type = '1' begin &Updating; where a.nam = @year end
